sys_script_include.description: Utility function to : 1. Fetch all currency fields from a record. 2.Check if mandatory fields are empty. 3. Execute an action synchrnously. 4. Generate SAP standard PO payload. 5. Generate SAP blanket PO payload. 6. Divide PO lines based on costcenter allocations. 7. Divite GR lines based on costcenter allocations.
sys_script_include.name: PsmSapUtils

sys_package.display_value: Sourcing and Procurement Operations Integration with SAP
